meanings.definition: A family of large-footed, ground-dwelling birds native to Australasia.
meanings.sent1: Megapodes are unique birds that live on the ground.
meanings.sent2: The megapodes in Australasia are fascinating creatures.
meanings.sent3: Why did the megapodes throw a party? Because they wanted to celebrate being ground-dwellers!
meanings.sent4: The megapodes, like earthy architects, build their homes on the ground.
meanings.sent5: The image of megapodes roaming the earth is truly captivating.

meanings.definition: The eggs of these birds, which are incubated in mounds of earth and vegetation.
meanings.sent1: The megapodes carefully tend to their eggs in the warm mounds.
meanings.sent2: In Australasia, the megapodes' egg incubation process is remarkable.
meanings.sent3: Why did the megapodes decide to have a picnic on their egg mound? They wanted a sunny-side-up experience!
meanings.sent4: The megapodes' egg mounds are like cozy nurseries in nature's cradle.
meanings.sent5: The sight of megapodes guarding their precious eggs is a testament to their dedication.
